analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.claimCoreTeamsTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#384-397):
	External calls:
	- devReward = maxTokenSupply - token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#386-390)
	- token.mintTokens(_to,devReward) (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#394)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ownerHasClaimedTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#395)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.claimPresaleTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#397-414):
	External calls:
	- token.mintTokens(presaleBonusAddressColdStorage,presaleBonusTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#410-412)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleBonusTokensClaimed (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#412-413)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.processTransaction (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#235-268):
	External calls:
	- token.mintTokens(_contributor,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#261)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorList (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#265)

Crowdsale.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#294-302) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20Token(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#298-302)

Crowdsale.checkCrowdsaleState (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#166-208) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- crowdsaleState != state.crowdsaleEnded && block.timestamp > crowdsaleEndedTime (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#193-206)
	- block.timestamp > presaleUnlimitedStartTime && block.timestamp <= crowdsaleStartTime (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#180-206)
	- block.timestamp > crowdsaleStartTime && block.timestamp <= crowdsaleEndedTime (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#186-206)
	- block.timestamp > presaleStartTime && block.timestamp <= presaleUnlimitedStartTime (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#174-206)

Crowdsale.claimEthIfFailed (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#322-337) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > crowdsaleEndedTime && ethRaised < minCap) (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#322-324)

Crowdsale.batchReturnEthIfFailed (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#339-357) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > crowdsaleEndedTime && ethRaised < minCap) (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#339-340)

Crowdsale.withdrawRemainingBalanceForManualRecovery (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#358-377) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > crowdsaleEndedTime) (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#365)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#19-21): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#47) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_stateChanged' of Crowdsale.refundTransaction (/unique_chucks/6/0x642ce99aad0ccc6fed7930117b217a18ce4b4229.sol#215) is not in mixedCase
